document.full_text: penguins center sidney crosby returned to the ice for the first time since missing 29 games with a concussion but did not know when he could play in a game.
document.title: penguins' crosby returns to practice
lines_and_colors: penguins center sidney crosby returned to the ice for the first time since missing 29 games with a concussion but did not know when he could play in a game.
